E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/2/1978
Subject: Progress of Roger Slagle
Dear Sir,
Roger Slagle is doing pretty good at A Salem Pirates!
He has an ERA of 1.23, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 6/5/1978
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more playing time.
I hope you put me in the starting lineup more often!

Regards,
Pete Varney



Date: Friday, 6/6/1978
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Don Leshnock
